markdownRemark.html: I spent a lot of time micro engineering and forgot to make things work first. I shouldn’t do that again. Overengineering in small parts is addictive to me but takes too much time for final goals. And in my current situation, where finishing matter more than refining, I will trade that off.

frontmatter.title: Get things done first, over engineered second!
